track.name: C U When U Get There
comments: Nothing to Lose

not the original! very disappointed...
I like matt0009 informed comment

The backing track is actually Pachelbel's Canon, one of the most famous pieces of classical music. The Vitamin C song used that as the melody, not this. It's actually used pretty frequently in pop music.  My Chemical Romance - Welcome to the Black Parade is another example. There's a whole list of them here - http://www.whosampled.com/search/samples/?q=pachelbel%27s%20canon
Represent.
Singing out loud with mum while being sent to school <3
not bad...
this is great memories
Vitamin C loved this track enough to use the backing track for Graduation (Friends Forever) <3

Wow ...... Reminds me of the good old days. I love this great song, by coolio also with the white outfit they used ... Xxx.

I remember as a 6-year-old this song so well, but untill yesterday I've only remembered the melody and a black man standing on a cliff wearing white clothes. Randomly my teacher used this song as an example of postmodernistic music, and all my childhood memories found their places again! Fantastic.
